attributes.action: action against syria must least to resignations
attributes.additional_details: syria is not our concern and we the undersigned wish our troops no part in another war esspecially where the side we support have links to al-qaeda or at a time when our forces have been cut so heavily by this govenment. there for we believe that should any type of action be taken no matter how small then the entire govenment must give there resignations a general election called and an investigation carried out into any mp's involved which must result in the said members being held accountable.
